title: Flower Travellin' Band - Satori (Heavy Eastern PsychRock, Japan
description:
This is Eastern flavoured hard and heavy psychedelic rock as only the Japanese can do it. Complete with high pitched wailing vocals and a mix of doom and blues. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll hear more than a hint of Sabbath ,I think, when they rock out. But then they stone you out with the coolest electric guitar mantras youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll ever hear. The vocals might actually put you off, but if you can get past them, or even enjoy them, this is a top notch album, up there with the best Japan had to offer. Note that track 6 might be a bonus track, I am not sure yet, but all references I find to the original release only mention the first 5 tracks. The notes in the cover I have are Japanese! Haha.
Enjoy!
Brainticket.
